Miami_Beach.The Bond on Brickell: The Bond on Brickell is a residential skyscraper under construction at 1080 Brickell Avenue. The 1080 Brickell site is located near the Tenth Street Metromover station and the Brickell Metrorail station. 1080 Brickell is located behind the existing 1110 Brickell office building and actually has frontage at 1198 Southeast 1st Avenue, not on Brickell Avenue.
